thread.title: Manafort arrives for hearing; challenges special counsel's authority

title: Manafort arrives for hearing; challenges special counsel's authority
text:
Manafort arrives for hearing; challenges special counsel's authority 2:54pm BST - 00:21 
President Donald Trump's former campaign chairman Paul Manafort will try to convince a federal judge on Wednesday to throw out criminal charges filed against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller, arguing Mueller has overstepped his legal authority. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Donald Trump's former campaign chairman Paul Manafort will try to convince a federal judge on Wednesday to throw out criminal charges filed against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller, arguing Mueller has overstepped his legal authority. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2H956oV
